DefaultEvent.Description:
Pirates! Treasure! Lost islands! Undead horrors! Ancient terror! Dreadful beasts! Intrigue! Star-crossed lovers! Battles of wit and cunning!

Well, that's your stories told. His turn...
DefaultEvent.Name: Tales of adventure and terror!

RareDefaultEvent.Description: Has he ever found what he was looking for? No, he admits, but he has found so much more! Besides, they call it 'lost' treasure for a reason. No sense looking for it where it's meant to be!
RareDefaultEvent.Name: An endless search

ChildBranches.Name: Trade stories with the Lost Treasure Hunter
ChildBranches.Description:
He has survived many adventures. So have you.
 [This will trade 10 x Tale of Terror!! for 10 x Zee-ztories]

DefaultEvent.Description: The Lost Treasure Hunter scans the latest headlines. "Fascinating," he mutters. "And should be most absorbent, if needs must."
DefaultEvent.Name: The trade is complete

ChildBranches.Name: $Recent News -> 最近の知らせ$Trade Recent News for Dynamite
ChildBranches.Description: "You have a newspaper? At least I won't feel entirely lost when I finally get back home."

DefaultEvent.Description: He breathes with relief. "Thank you. His Nibs can talk your ears off about leaving things on your plate. Not least other peoples' ears..."
DefaultEvent.Name: The trade is complete

ChildBranches.Name: $Foxfire Candle -> 狐火の蝋燭$Trade Supplies for Foxfire Candles
ChildBranches.Description: "Don't tell the others, but I still can't bring myself to eat like they do. I pretend, but it's a good thing there's berries. Wouldn't say no to something a bit more."

DefaultEvent.Description: "What is it?" He peers. "I think this might be a whole new species. That raises some problematic questions. Red or white wine? His Loudship will want to know..."
DefaultEvent.Name: The trade is complete

ChildBranches.Name: $Live Specimen -> 生体標本, Flare -> 照明弾$Trade a Live Specimen for a Flare
ChildBranches.Description: "The chaps will sometimes eat fish, if it falls in their laps." He looks hopeful. "Do you have any that could be, ah, carefully thrown?"

DefaultEvent.Description:
You bury the 'treasure', and with a few careful coughs and prods push the Lost Treasure Hunter towards it. He falls to the ground, digging furiously until he unearths his prize: bright, shining - his gaze pulled into its revelatory core.

But soon, his excitement fades. Having found what he thought he wanted, his obsession is over and the reward merely a bauble; as diminished by being dragged from desire to reality as the face of an angel in mere paint.

Sadder still is that once you persuade him to give you the map, it takes but a moment to realise his mistake. It's of Fountainhead! The fool had it upside down!
DefaultEvent.Name: A secret revealed

ChildBranches.Name: Persuade him to give you his map
ChildBranches.Description: It could be a profitable kindness.

DefaultEvent.Name: He bids you a good day

ChildBranches.Name: Leave him to his search
ChildBranches.Description: You have your own treasures to discover.

Description: His adventures have left him with many tools for finding gold and glory. A sense of direction is not one of them.
Name: The Lost Treasure Hunter
